Package gameobjects.towers

Class Tower

java.lang.Object
gameobjects.GameObject
gameobjects.towers.Tower
Direct Known Subclasses:
FireRobot, IceRobot, LightningRobot, Robot, ScissorRobot
public abstract class Tower extends GameObject
The abstract class for a tower - a buyable and placeable object that defends against bloons by shooting projectiles.
